We know this is the biggest rel of the year.
We know you will get this.

Hard Candy is the eleventh studio album by American
singer-songwriter Madonna and will be released at the end
of April 2008 by Warner Bros. Records. After the success
of her last studio album, late 2005s Confessions on a
Dance Floor, Hard Candy will be the last studio album to
be released under her contract with Warner Bros,
excluding a compilation album to be released in late
2008.
